project-page-descript: On this page you can see my projects which I've been working recently
homepage-description: I'm Dmytro Svyatodukh and I thought become frontend developer, because isn't boring!
projects-description: Look at here! How you see, I really tried when I was doing it!
hello: When I was a teenager, I dreamed to being a Ukrainian punk rock star. I dedicated many years to music, and now it's a big part of my life. Since 2015, I worked in a company where I was markup developer/HTML coder almost 7 years. I did everything related to it. I had an experience with different CMS: modx, wordpress and few times was magento 1.9/2. In 2022 when became the War, the company closed and I started to learn in order to will be better. That's really fascinating journey.
oops: Oops! You seem to be lost =)
after-end: you will be redirect to Homepage! Bye!

list-projects.title: Calculate Price of Service
list-projects.description: In this project I wanted to make functionality of calculating price per repair for potential customer where him will see how much it costs, and can download PDF file with information about it.

list-projects.title: My Portfolio (current app)
list-projects.description: This is my first project which created with react js. For that I decided to create simple project where I could used next tools: react router, multi language and instruments for SEO.

list-projects.title: SWAPI
list-projects.description: A little project for work practice with requests. The SWAPI is ideal for these goals. Also was interesting  to do the functions of search and pagination for categories.
